name: Codelynks Software Solutions Pvt. Ltd
description:
Codelynks Software Solutions Pvt. Ltd. is a fast growing technology start-up, with expertise in various disruptive technologies including but not limited to Enterprise Mobility, Consumer Applications, business process automation, web design/development, IoT convergence, etc.  With development offices in India, Codelynks serves a rapidly-growing list of clients, by delivering compelling solutions for clients, ranging from start-ups to enterprise leaders. 
 
We offer full service creative design, development, project management, strategy and distribution, and partners closely with our customers to deliver integrated, robust and scalable solution for their business and help them to manage the global convergence of software, the cloud and mobile devices.
